name: My first day as a ghost
name_original: My first day as a ghost
description:
Submission to Weekly Game Jam #37 Theme: Combination

My first day as a ghost is a platformer game where you decide how to play each level.

Every level has more than one set of actions that can be used to complete it!

Start by exploring the level and carefully think  what actions are needed to complete it. Once you got it, pick those actions and give it a try!

TIP: If you're stuck you can always restart the level with R.

Controls:

You decide!

Authors:

Modelling by dasPanjo

Programming by dasPanjo and jvolonte

Level Design by jvolonte

Main Theme by Dallas

SFX  from: ZapSplat

If you enjoy the game and would like to see more, let us know!
